org.corfudb.protocols.wireprotocol.orchestrator

Interface IWorkflow

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AddNodeWorkflow

    public interface IWorkflow
    A workflow is an abstract container that specifies a series of ordered steps that achieves a multi-step operation. For example, adding a new node to the cluster, which requires several steps to complete. Created by Maithem on 10/25/17.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default boolean completed()
      Returns whether all the actions completed successfully or not.
      List<Action> getActions()
      Returns the ordered that are associated with this workflow.
      UUID getId()
      Gets the unique identifier of this workflow instance
      String getName()
      Return the name of this workflow
